creator: niklas@curalia.se
text:
Custom properties for a word document does not show up when one right-clicks in
explorer and selectes properties. Explorer seems to be picky about padding.

creator: niklas@curalia.se
text:
Created attachment 12579
Patch that adds padding

creator: klute@apache.org
text:
Niklas, thanks a lot for your patch! I was hunting for that bug anyway. Your
patch works fine, and I'll check it in later.

creator: klute@apache.org
